data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
(I forget if I've already done this, if so, forgive the
    redundancy.)

    This module deals with the datastructures generated by
    XML::Parser::EasyTree or XML::Handler::Trees. It's an alternate way
    of generating these structures on the fly (rather than parsing a
    file in) with an interface similar to CGI.pm . Since the latter
    module is more maintained I'm basing the namespace off of that one.
